career: I made my first website at the age of 15 and I started using tools like Flash or Dreamweaver, I've worked on a variety of projects, from alexa apps to the Volkswagen Spain website or videogames with C# and Unity. I'm now lead teacher at Ironhack, fostering the next generation of developers.
bio: I'm a music producer and developer, passionate about exploring, learning and building new things from the ground. My approach is rooted in humility, thriving within supportive teams that value inclusivity and respect.
